Header: DGGS Meets Commander SF-West & Directors under DGGS Branch
Content: Major General Nisshyanka Ranawana, Director General General Staff (DGGS), together with Directors under command to the DGGS Branch on Friday (15) had a cordial discussion with Major General Sathyapriya Liyanage, Commander Security Forces - West  (SF-West) and all Directors at the Sri Lanka Light Infantry Regimental Centre auditorium. The aim of this meet was to share views on the role and tasks of the Directorates under the DGGS Branch at the Army Headquarters and learn about ground realities. Representatives of all establishments under command to the SF-West forwarded their matters to the attention of the visiting DGGS at the same occasion.
